name: Last Bible III
overview: Last Bible III, sometimes Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible III, is the third game in the Last Bible Megami Tensei spin-off series. The player controls Ciel, who has taken a journey that will eventually in connect to the game's intro, where a man named Alek stumbles through a frozen climate to collapse at the entrance to the world of monsters. While a more traditional turn-based RPG compared to the other Megami Tensei games, the player still negotiates with and recruits monsters.
